channel.title: Managing Storage Backends on Huawei
channel.description: Recent content in Managing Storage Backends on Huawei

item.title: Querying a Storage Backend
item.description: Run the oceanctl commands in Querying a Storage Backend to query the storage backend information.

item.title: Deleting a Storage Backend
item.description: Do not delete a storage backend when a volume management operation is being performed on it. Example of Deleting a Backend Run the following command to obtain information about a storage backend. oceanctl get backend The following is an example of the command output. NAMESPACE NAME PROTOCOL STORAGETYPE SN STATUS ONLINE URL huawei-csi backend-1 roce oceanstor-san xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Bound true https://192.168.129.157:8088 huawei-csi backend-2 roce oceanstor-san xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx Bound true https://192.168.129.158:8088 Run the following command to delete the specified storage backend.
